hero.headline: Guha Abahinzi Imbaraga n'Amakuru Ashingiye ku Makuru
hero.subHeadline: Tegura neza, usarure neza, kandi uhurire n'abaguzi. Farmlytics izana isesengura rya kijyambere ku murima wawe.
hero.taglinePlaceholder: Fungura ubushobozi bwose bw'umurima wawe n'amakuru ashingiye ku bigaragara no gutegura neza.

main.subword: Injira muri Farmlytics uyu munsi utangire guhinga intsinzi ukoresheje ubwenge bushingiye ku makuru.

features.title: Ibyo Ukeneye Byose Kugirango Uterambere Umurima Wawe
features.subtitle: Ibikoresho byuzuye byakozwe ku bahinzi ba none kugirango barusheho gukora no kubona inyungu.

cropPlanner.title: Gahunda y'Ibihingwa Yihariye
cropPlanner.description: Bona inama zishingiye kuri AI zishingiye ku butaka bwawe, ikirere, n'ibyo isoko risaba kugirango unoze ibyemezo byawe byo gutera.

marketConnection.title: Modire yo Guhuza Isoko
marketConnection.description: Hura n'abaguzi kandi ubone ibiciro by'isoko mu gihe nyacyo kugirango ubone agaciro keza ku musaruro wawe.

harvestTracker.title: Gukurikirana Umusaruro n'Amafaranga
harvestTracker.description: Kurikirana umusaruro wawe, amafaranga yakoreshejwe, n'amafaranga yinjiye ahantu hamwe. Sobanukirwa ubuzima bw'imari bw'umurima wawe mu kanya.

visualInsights.title: Ikibaho cy'Amakuru Agaragara
visualInsights.description: Ibishushanyo byiza n'ibishushanyo bituma amakuru y'umurima akomeye yoroshye gusobanukirwa no gukora.

exportInsights.title: Kohereza no Gusangira Raporo
exportInsights.description: Kora raporo z'umwuga zo gusangira n'abafatanyabikorwa, abatanga inguzanyo, cyangwa ku bijanye nawe.

cropMonitoring.title: Gukurikirana Ibihingwa
cropMonitoring.description: Guhindura ubuhinzi n'amakuru. Shakisha amakuru agaragara mu gihe nyacyo ku buzima bw'ibihingwa byawe.

analyticsDashboard.title: Ikibaho cy'Isesengura
analyticsDashboard.description: Uburyo bwo guhuza imirimo butuma umusaruro w'umurima wawe wiyongera kandi ugakora neza.

marketplace.title: Isoko
marketplace.description: Kuguhuza n'abaguzi kugirango ubone ibiciro byiza ku musaruro wawe.

ctaSection.headline: Witeguye Guhindura Ubuhinzi Bwawe?
ctaSection.subHeadline: Injira mu bahinzi ibihumbi bakoresha Farmlytics kugirango bafate ibyemezo byiza kandi bongere umusaruro wabo.

password.min: Ijambo ry'ibanga rigomba kuba nibura inyuguti 8

register.title: Iyandikishe
register.subtitle: Tangira kugendana natwe uyu munsi
register.welcomeSubtitle: Tangira urugendo rwawe natwe uyu munsi

firstName.label: Izina rya mbere
firstName.invalid: Izina rya mbere rigomba kuba nibura inyuguti 2

lastName.label: Izina ry'umuryango
lastName.invalid: Izina ry'umuryango rigomba kuba nibura inyuguti 2

password.label: Ijambo ry'ibanga
password.min: Ijambo ry'ibanga rigomba kuba nibura inyuguti 8
password.complexity: Ijambo ryibanga rigomba kuba ririmo nibura inyuguti nkuru imwe, inyuguti ntoya imwe, n'umubare umwe

register.termsRequired: Ugomba kwemera amabwiriza n'amategeko y'ubuzima bwite

forgotPassword.title: Wibagiwe ijambo ry'ibanga
forgotPassword.subtitle: Subiza ijambo ry'ibanga
forgotPassword.pageSubtitle: Andika aderesi yawe ya imeyili tuzakwohereze link yo kurisubiza
forgotPassword.success: Link yo kurisubiza yoherejwe! Reba imeyili yawe.
forgotPassword.successMessage: Inzira yo gusubiza ijambo ry'ibanga yoherejwe kuri aderesi imeyili yawe. Ndakwinginze, reba muri imeyili yawe.

verifyEmail.verifyingMessage: Ndakwinginze, tega amatwi mugihe twemeza aderesi imeyili yawe.
verifyEmail.successMessage: Aderesi imeyili yawe yemejwe neza. Ubu urashobora kwinjira.
verifyEmail.errorMessageDefault: Habayeho ikibazo mu kwemeza imeyili yawe. Inzira ishobora kuba itari yo cyangwa yararangiye.
verifyEmail.resendingMessage: Kohereza bundi bushya imeyili yo kwemeza...
verifyEmail.resendSuccessMessage: Imeyili nshya yo kwemeza yoherejwe kuri imeyili yawe. Ndakwinginze, yirebe.
verifyEmail.resendErrorMessage: Kohereza bundi bushya imeyili yo kwemeza byananiranye. Ndakwinginze, ongera ugerageze nyuma.
verifyEmail.initialMessage: Inzira yo kwemeza yoherejwe kuri aderesi imeyili yawe. Ndakwinginze, reba muri imeyili yawe maze ukande kuri iyo nzira kugirango ukore konti yawe.

market.pageDescription: Sura ibyifuzo by’isoko, amashyirahamwe, abaguzi n’abohereza hanze kugira ngo utere imbere mu buhinzi bwawe.
